subject: Theorize want lick my pusy for free?
body: .Couldn.t be better. I.m filing one of these links, and when it goes we.re both free. See if you can.t slip the chain through the holes in your shacldes and lay it down without letting the next slave know what is happening. We.ll wear the iron cuffs for now. There is no time to play around with them, and they shouldn.t bother us too much. Do the guards come through here at all during the night to check on the slaves?.
